name: DW6 Empires
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Dynasty Warriors 6 Empires is a fusion of fast-paced action and tactical strategy.  Conquer your foes and unite all of China under your banner as a Ruler, or experience the thrill of battle from a new perspective as an Officer.  Play as a Musou hero of legend, or create up to 100 customized warriors of your own design! Choose your own path through the chaos of the Three Kingdoms!
